matsonj/csv-everything

Converts images of tables into CSV files

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • CSV editor for huge files, open source, works on Mac, Windows, Linux
  • Extracts tables from PDFs into CSV files using OCR engines
  • Table identification and extraction from images using OpenCV
  • Offline CSV editor for large files
  • huge list of CLI and TUI tools in CSV format
  • command-line tool for fast CSV and spreadsheet data wrangling
  • CSV importer workflow for handling uploads, column mapping, validation, and preview
  • Terminal tool for tabular data across many formats
  • command line tool for querying and transforming SQL, CSV, and Excel data
  • Cross-platform CSV editor with SQL-like queries
